question: Which global organisation has launched the ''COVID Action Platform'' to convene the business community to support for COVID-19?
explanation:
The World Economic Forum recently launched a new platform with the support of the World Health Organisation (WHO) to convene the global business community for a collective support for the COVID-19 outbreak.
The newly formed platform is called \'\'COVID Action Platform\'\' and is open to all businesses and industry groups and other stakeholders including the governments around the globe. This first of its kind platform will integrate the efforts of all the entities in tackling the outbreak together.
